game.name: DCS: F-5E Flaming Cliffs
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, LAN PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Downloadable Content, Tracked Controller Support, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: F-5E for DCS World is an easy-to-learn aircraft module that is based on the full-fidelity DCS: F-5E Tiger II. A more accessible Flaming Cliffs-style control concept allows new players to quickly jump into the F-5E and have fun.
game.shortDescriptionEn: F-5E for DCS World is an easy-to-learn aircraft module that is based on the full-fidelity DCS: F-5E Tiger II. A more accessible Flaming Cliffs-style control concept allows new players to quickly jump into the F-5E and have fun.
